    "name": "2*A079291 (twice squares of Pell numbers).",
    "comment": [
        "Cross-referenced sequences A116484, A001109, A108475, A090390 are also generated by A*B given in the program code."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "G.f. 2*x*(1-x)/((x+1)*(x^2-6*x+1))",
        "a(n) = ( ( (1-Sqrt[ 2 ])^n + (1+Sqrt[ 2 ])^n) /2)^2 + (-1)^(n+1). The formula (1-Sqrt[ 2 ])^n + (1+Sqrt[ 2 ])^n) /2) is the that given by Reinhard Zumkeller in A001333. Furthermore, ( ( (A001333)_(n) )^2 + ( (A114619)_(n) )^2 - 1)^(1/2) = A001542_(n) and ( 2*A001542_(n) + 1)^(1/2) = A001333_(2n) - Antonio Pane (apane1(AT)spc.edu), Dec 15 2007"
    ],
    "program": [
        "Floretion Algebra Multiplication Program, FAMP Code: 1jbasejseq[A*B] with A = - .5'i + .5'j - .5i' + .5j' + 'kk' - .5'ik' - .5'jk' - .5'ki' - .5'kj' and B = - .5'j + .5'k - .5j' + .5k' - 'ii' - .5'ij' - .5'ik' - .5'ji' - .5'ki' ; apart from initial term."
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A116484, A001109, A108475, A090390.",
